## Account class

A representation of a RIOT account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Account 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [identifier](./shieldbow.account.identifier.md) |  | string | The username\#tag format of user's RIOT account. |
|  [playerId](./shieldbow.account.playerid.md) |  | string | The unique ID for this account. This is also called the PUUID. |
|  [username](./shieldbow.account.username.md) |  | string | The RIOT account username of this user. |
|  [userTag](./shieldbow.account.usertag.md) |  | string | The RIOT account tag of this user. |
